page.title: 13GOVERNMENT AND HEALTH
page.content: THE AREA COMES UNDER THE ADMINISTRATION OF AYLESBURY VALE DISTRICT COUNCIL. {HEALTH.}WINSLOW HEALTH CENTRE SERVES BOTH DRAYTON PARSLOW AND MURSLEY. DRAYTON PARSLOW ALSO USE HEALTH CENTRES AT BLETCHLEY,MILTON KEYNES AND LEIGHTON BUZZARD.{DENTISTS}CAN ALSO BE FOUND AT THE ABOVE PLACES AND BUCKINGHAM AND AYLESBURY.{HOSPITALS USED ARE MILTON KEYNES AND AYLESBURY. THERE ARE NO{POLICE}STATIONED IN THE VILLAGES.WE COME UNDER THE JURISDICTION OF THE THAMES VALLEY POLICE AND ARE POLICED FROM MILTON KEYNES.THE NEAREST {FIRE SERVICE}IS TO BE FOUND AT WINSLOW.
